attributes.action: Include more psychology, morality and business in school education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think psychology, morality and business are severely lacking in education.  
If children are taught more about the power of the subconscious mind and how to utilise it's power from an early age, to work with other's, to respect and understand other people and the importance of business, job creation and innovation then this country can progress massively. 
Morality is the backbone of society and economic progress yet it is not talked about in school
